sense.def:
A stump
je majhen del nečesa, ki ostane, ko vse drugo odstranimo ali odlomimo.

seg.quote: We left him sitting on the stump of an old oak tree.

sense.def:
The stumps
so pri kriketu tri pokončne palice, ki tvorijo vratca.

Kadar vprašanje ali težava
stumps someone
, človek za to ne najde odgovora ali rešitve.

seg.quote: ...the question that has stumped philosophers since the beginning of time.

sense.def:
To stump somewhere
pomeni nekam iti jezno in s težkimi koraki.

seg.quote: She stumped back into the house.

sense.def:
To stump up a sum of money
pomeni plačati potrebni znesek za nekaj, pogosto oklevajoče;

seg.quote: The government is being asked to stump up the balance.
